item.title: Borg Backup
item.description: For long, I was looking for an ideal backup setup. Expectations were minimal;periodically backup set of folders from the main disk to secondary disk, compressing the files to save disk space, retaining the earlier sets and easy to learn, deploy and maintain. I tried and dropped many backup solutions because of cumbersome setup and steep learning curve. Finally, I chose Borg Backup for its sophistication and ease of use; thereupon, using it for more than a year now.
